thread.section_title: New York Hilton Midtown - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not my favorite
thread.title_full: Not my favorite - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: drjsaleh
title: Not my favorite
text:
We stayed at the Hilton for a good few days. It was recommended by a family member.
The location is central but there are many ither hotels with a better location than this.
The room furniture was oudated. A couple of nights later was asked for the room to be changed, we paid for an ipgrade to same size of room but with different furniture.
The room AC wasn't well positioned so we felt very hot at night. The solution was to open the glass window to let some cool air in.
There was no water kettle in the room, so it was impossible to make tea or coffee when needed at the odd hours of the day or night. So frustrating.
For a coffee or tea you need to go down to buy it from the cafe near the lobby.
The lobby itself was like a busy market most of the time, noisy and loud.
Corridors were many times full of noisy school children staying in the hotel as part of group travellers. The kids were very loud at night we had to call the hotel staff to deal with them.
Will not stay here again.
